A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi really and truly broke my heart.  I cannot believe the script that written for Luke.  How did this get approved? \n\nI've read a lot of reviews compare it to Marvel or Guardians of the Galaxy.  I wouldn't know about that as I don't watch those.  But I do know Star Wars and this movie doesn't deserve to call itself part of that saga.  If I wanted to watch those other movies\, I'd buy a ticket for them.  I wanted to see Star Wars\, but that is not what I got.
